```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```


```{r}
ggplot(survdat_early, aes(x=mass, y= survival, color=interaction(sex,age)))+
  geom_beeswarm(groupOnX = FALSE) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", method.args=list(family="binomial"))
```
